metadata.title: CVE-2021-4001 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's ebpf verifier betweenbpf_map_update_elem and bpf_map_freeze due to a missing lock inkernel/bpf/syscall.c. In this flaw, a local user with a special privilege(cap_sys_admin or cap_bpf) can modify the frozen mapped address space. Thisflaw affects kernel versions prior to 5.16 rc2.
